item.title: The typical American worker has $955 saved for retirement
item.description: Millions of Americans lack access to any type of retirement plan, hampering their ability to save for old age.

item.title: Bad Bunny says 2026 Super Bowl halftime show will "be a huge party"
item.description: Bad Bunny says he wants to bring his culture to his Super Bowl halftime show Sunday.

item.title: Maryland man faces attempted murder charges for targeting OMB director
item.description: Colin Demarco was arrested in January, months after he was seen in a Ring camera image at Vought's door, wearing a surgical mask and gloves.
